meanings.definition: Engaged in a physical struggle or fight
meanings.sent1: The rassled opponents were both exhausted after the match.
meanings.sent2: The two rassled fighters showed great strength and determination.
meanings.sent3: The rassled kittens playfully tumbled around the room.
meanings.sent4: The rassled warriors battled fiercely under the blazing sun.
meanings.sent5: The image of the rassled wrestlers was etched in the spectators' minds.

meanings.sent1: He rassled his brother to the ground during their playful fight.
meanings.sent2: The two friends rassled for fun in the backyard.
meanings.sent3: The siblings rassled over who would get the last cookie.
meanings.sent4: She rassled with the heavy suitcase to get it into the car.
meanings.sent5: The wrestler rassled his opponent into submission with skillful moves.

meanings.definition: Engaged in rough or playful physical activity
meanings.sent1: The rassled puppies rolled around in the grass joyfully.
meanings.sent2: The children were covered in dirt after their rassled playtime.
meanings.sent3: The rassled friends laughed as they chased each other around the park.
meanings.sent4: The rassled kittens pounced on each other in a playful manner.
meanings.sent5: The rassled puppies wagged their tails happily during their rough play.
